Marvin Kaplan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marvin_Kaplan 0 Marvin Wilbur Kaplan (January 24, 1927 – August 25, 2016) was an American actor, screenwriter and playwright. Marvin_Wilbur_Kaplan ( January_24_,_1927 – August_25_,_2016 ) was an_American_actor , screenwriter_and_playwright .
